ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
c_stdlib:
- sysroot
c_stdlib_version:
- '2.17'
channel_sources:
- conda-forge/label/capstone_dev,conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cxx_compiler:
- gxx
cxx_compiler_version:
- '14'
dbus:
- '1'
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
freetype:
- '2'
libcurl:
- '8'
pin_run_as_build:
  python:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
python:
- 3.10.* *_cpython
- 3.11.* *_cpython
- 3.12.* *_cpython
- 3.13.* *_cp313
- 3.14.* *_cp314
target_platform:
- linux-64
tbb_devel:
- '2022'
zlib:
- '1'

about.summary:
A real time, nanosecond resolution, remote telemetry, hybrid frame and
sampling profiler for games and other applications.

sampling profiler for games and other applications.

name: tracy-profiler-split

about.summary:
A real time, nanosecond resolution, remote telemetry, hybrid frame and
sampling profiler for games and other applications.

A real time, nanosecond resolution, remote telemetry, hybrid frame and
sampling profiler for games and other applications.

raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "tracy" %}
{% set pkg_name = "tracy-profiler" %}
{% set version = "0.13.1" %}


package:
  name: {{ pkg_name }}-split
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/wolfpld/{{ name }}/archive/refs/tags/v{{ version }}.zip
  sha256: a1ecc73b0547512d4bab71278a14581763940118baef835a8033a675f3c8e06d
  patches:
    # Avoid linking issue on MacOS
    - patches/0001-Don-t-link-against-Python-library-in-Python-module.patch
    # Avoid linking issues on Linux with conda packages
    - patches/0002-Avoid-linking-issues-when-linking-against-conda-pack.patch
    # Don't retrieve git ref
    - patches/0003-Don-t-retrieve-git-ref.patch
    # Avoid to use pkg-config as most as possible
    # Some .pc file are not available on Windows
    - patches/0004-Use-find_package-instead-of-package-config-to-.patch
    # Use embed build in native mode and installed in path
    - patches/0005-Use-embed-installed-as-an-external-project.patch  # [build_platform != target_platform]
build:
  number: 0

outputs:
  - name: {{ pkg_name }}-client
    build:
      run_exports:
        - {{ pin_subpackage(pkg_name ~ '-client', max_pin='x.x.x') }}
    script: build_tracy_client.sh  # [not win]
    script: build_tracy_client.bat  # [win]
    requirements:
      build:
        - cmake
        - ninja
        - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
        - {{ stdlib("c") }}
      host:
      run:
    test:
      commands:
        - test -f $PREFIX/lib/libTracyClient${SHLIB_EXT}            # [not win]
        - if not exist %PREFIX%\Library\bin\TracyClient.dll exit 1  # [win]
  - name: {{ pkg_name }}-gui
    script: build_tracy_gui.sh  # [not win]
    script: build_tracy_gui.bat  # [win]
    build:
      skip: true  # [ppc64le or aarch64]
    requirements:
      build:
        - cmake
        - ninja
        - pkg-config
        - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
        - {{ stdlib("c") }}
        # clang-scan-dep is needed to build cxx 20 module from plugixml
        - clang-tools  # [osx]
      host:
        - freetype
        # CMake doesn't find freetype without zlib
        - libcurl
        - zlib
        - glfw
        - dbus          # [linux]
        - libegl-devel  # [linux]
        - libcapstone   # [linux or osx]
        - xorg-libx11   # [linux]
        - tbb-devel
      run:
    test:
      commands:
        - test -f $PREFIX/bin/tracy-profiler                           # [not win]
        - if not exist %PREFIX%\Library\bin\tracy-profiler.exe exit 1  # [win]
        - tracy-profiler --help
  - name: {{ pkg_name }}-client-python
    script: build_tracy_client_python.sh  # [not win]
    script: build_tracy_client_python.bat  # [win]
    requirements:
      build:
        - python                                 # [build_platform != target_platform]
        - cross-python_{{ target_platform }}     # [build_platform != target_platform]
        - cmake
        - ninja
        - pkg-config
        - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
        - {{ stdlib("c") }}
        # clang-scan-dep is needed to build cxx 20 module
        - clang-tools  # [osx]
      host:
        - python
        - pip
        - scikit-build-core
        - {{ pin_subpackage(pkg_name ~ '-client', exact=true) }}
      run:
        - python
        - {{ pin_subpackage(pkg_name ~ '-client', exact=true) }}
    test:
      commands:
        # TRACY_NO_INVARIANT_CHECK must be set on CI machine because the CPU
        # doesn't support some instructions.
        - TRACY_NO_INVARIANT_CHECK=1 python -c "import tracy_client"         # [not_win]
        - set TRACY_NO_INVARIANT_CHECK=1 && python -c "import tracy_client"  # [win]
  - name: {{ pkg_name }}
    requirements:
      host:
        # Explicitely add a python requirement to change hash between python version
        - python
      run:
        - {{ pin_subpackage(pkg_name ~ '-client', exact=true) }}
        - {{ pin_subpackage(pkg_name ~ '-client-python', exact=true) }}
    test:
      commands:
        - test -f $PREFIX/lib/libTracyClient${SHLIB_EXT}                     # [not win]
        - if not exist %PREFIX%\Library\bin\TracyClient.dll exit 1           # [win]
        - TRACY_NO_INVARIANT_CHECK=1 python -c "import tracy_client"         # [not_win]
        - set TRACY_NO_INVARIANT_CHECK=1 && python -c "import tracy_client"  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/wolfpld/tracy
  summary: |
    A real time, nanosecond resolution, remote telemetry, hybrid frame and
    sampling profiler for games and other applications.
  license: BSD-3-Clause
  license_family: BSD
  license_file: LICENSE
  license_url: https://github.com/wolfpld/tracy/blob/master/LICENSE
  dev_url: https://github.com/wolfpld/tracy

extra:
  feedstock-name: {{ pkg_name }}
  recipe-maintainers:
    - ManifoldFR
    - jorisv
    - jcarpent

about.summary:
A real time, nanosecond resolution, remote telemetry, hybrid frame and
sampling profiler for games and other applications.
